name: ListAccount
description: Retrieves a collection of Accounts belonging to the account used to make the request

FriendlyName.description: Only return the Account resources with friendly names that exactly match this name.

Status.description: Only return Account resources with the given status. Can be `closed`, `suspended` or `active`.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
